Text: Not one of your best ones, but still ok.Thanks

Thank you for your sweet work. I downloaded them all. I must say 90% I didn't keep but there are a few UNBELIEVABLE diamonds in there that it's worth ALL THE WAY! Those diamond tracks I forgot about, but they gave me such a fantastic teenage remembrance ... I can't explain it! Again THANK YOU SO MUCH!

Hey 80zforever! You have an absolutely amazing collection of Rare 80's hits! I am new to using torrents and have been searching all over the net for A Cha Cha At The Opera, a rare 1982 release.
I almost gave up but now that I see you collect rare vinyls, I'm REALLY hoping you have that track.
Please let me know!  Thanks!
fem2fem I am sorry. I don't think I have it. Good luck with finding it tough. Just out of curosity was this written by Joseph McKenna? kind of discoish?

Yes it was written by Joseph McKenna and it's like a disco concerto ... very campy with lots of string instruments.  I have it on audio cassette but the quality is not very good. Would be lovely if I could get the mp3!  Anyway, thanks for replying.  You really know your 80's stuff!  Do drop me an e-mail if you ever manage to find this track. My addy is peachybuns@gmail.com and my name is Liana.
Thanks so much!
Thnx for "Cook Da Books - Your Eyes", the only of these I downloaded.
